cards.name: 3-Head
cards.description: Basic Attack changes into 3 directions for 16s. On hit, earn 1 stack. Damage to foes +100%. Damage to Challenge or lower monsters +400%.

cards.name: Mayhem
cards.description: For 30s, Atk. Speed +3% for 4s every time skills are used, up to 15%.

cards.name: Twisted Fate
cards.description: For 4s, your skill Damage either stays the same or increases by 40%.

cards.name: Corrosion
effects: Chance of debuff for increased damage
cards.description: For 30s, gain a 30% chance of +10% Damage to the foe for 5s.

cards.name: Ghost
cards.description: Ignore collision with monsters. Move Speed +20% and Damage from foes -50% for 3 hits for 16s.

cards.name: Cull
effects: Increased crit chance and crit damage
cards.description: For 4s, Crit Rate for all skill attacks 100% and Crit Damage +50% when they hit 1 foe.

cards.name: Balance
cards.description: For 30s, your Stacking skills are enhanced and grant you 1 more stack with each hit.

cards.name: Judgment
cards.description: For 4s, Ruin skills always trigger the 4 stack effect, regardless of the actual number of stacks cast upon foes.

cards.name: Moon
cards.description: Cooldown -10% and MP Recovery Speed increase +20% for 30s.

cards.name: Star
cards.description: Recovers 100% MP. Remaining skills Cooldown -15% except for Awakening, Movement, and Stand Up skills.

cards.name: Wheel of Fortune
cards.description: The Cooldown of the next skill decreases by 100%.

skills.name: Call of Destiny
skills.description: Throw a card at the target location to inflict damage and launch foes into the air.

skills.name: Return
skills.description: Throw a card toward the target location to inflict damage and counter. Use the skill again to slam foes into the ground and inflict damage.

skills.name: Quadra Accelerate
skills.description: Throw cards at the target location 4 times to inflict damage.

skills.name: Scratch Dealer
skills.description: Dash toward the target location and inflict damage. Use the skill again to strike downward and inflict damage.

skills.name: Spiral Edge
skills.description: Leap toward the the target location while throwing a card to inflict damage.

skills.name: Celestial Rain
skills.description: Call down a rain of cards at the target location to inflict damage. Airborne foes recieve additional damage and are slammed onto the ground.

skills.name: Serendipity
skills.description: Fan out cards at the target location twice to inflict damage and knock foes away.

skills.name: Secret Garden
skills.description: Instantly inflict damage to nearby foes. Foes with 4 stacks are slammed onto the ground.
